message.body: Thinking of you
Mmmmm I'm bummed. Katie's staying with pat all weekend. Bad timing.
Why? I just heard some girl tell who I assumed to be her boyfriend that he was stressing her out and thought fondly of you
Just to visit him. He says that they were waiting for it to work out that she could come. I'm just disappointed and hurt. But you know, princess needs her visit to new York.
How was class?
Sorry to text you three times in a row, but what is the beach house song from last night?
Call you in a bit hot stuff
Thinking of you Mattie
I'm worried
Ugh I feel horrible that ive been such a mess. You probably don't want to talk to me since I'm such a downer but it'd mean a lot.
Mattie not true! I'm thinking of you and will call after class
I appreciate everything you do. I'm just having a rough time. I'm sorry to be doing this to you
Im sure your phones just coincidentally and unfortunately broken and I understand you're busy I just could really use you and your words and it drives me crazy when I can't get a hold of you
Did you get home ok?
Are you awake?
I wish I could hold your hand today
Thinking of you love
Just leaving Chicago now. I love you
Landed in PA
Are you in Chicago?
Still out love I Will call when I get time
Home. I love you mucho
Sorry Mattie. I will call when I get home. I love youuuuuu
Phone is dying. Maybe dead. But I miss you
No worries. Do you know when?
One hour more or less
I love you Martha. You are exciting
Make a wish
My wish is you
Mine too Mattie. You're too hawt
I hope you wish for me for more reasons than I'm "hawt"
Really not ok tim
I am scared out of my mind for you right now please please please let me know you're ok
Are you trying to get me to end things so you don't have to? If i did would you even care?

I trusted that you wouldnt do this to me so much especially today that I really believed you had died or been hurt. I'm going to lose that ability to trust and believe what you say and who you are if I haven't already.
You seem unconcerned. I haven't been treated with such carelessness by even a friend or a boyfriend ever.
It would be great to hear from you
I'm really sorry Mattie. I got stupidly drunk
I love you Martha. I wish I was there painting with you
The phillies lost. I'm sad for your city
Can we vchat later?
I'm feeling scared
Wish I was with you. I bet you look ravishing
On my way home. I'll call soon
Kool
I love you Martha! I feel lucky to have you.
That's very very sweet. Thank you
Are you being mordant? I do love you and it hurts to think that I can't touch you
Not mordant. Can we live in the same city again sometime soon?
Which one?
I'll live wherever you want
I dig it!
It kind of made me cry
How you doing pretty babe?
Mmmmm ok. :) are you free to talk in a bit?
Heading home soon!
I want to go to bed soon so the sooner the better
OK I'll call asap
Happy first day beautiful woman! You'll do great!
Thank you, Tim. That means so much.
Thinking of you my favorite actor
I'm good at this! It feels so nice. I love you.
I'm happy for you Mattie!
Call you soon!
I missssssssssss you!
It looks so cool Martha! More please!
I am excited for you!
I wish I could be in contact with you more. Maybe we can call you earlier than bed time so I'm not so sleepy
I'd like that too. Although I think I'm gonna be in studio late unfortunately
I'm sorry matts. I am totally flustered right now
No worries, are you apologizing because you cant call?
Yes! I'm sorry
Did you send me that article for a reason...?
Only because I thought it was really interesting and you're the only woman I know who might read the whole thing and have something to say about it
Also, remember when we had a convo about my friend who wanted to have kids with one person, raise them with another, and then spend her later life with another
Mmmmk just making sure you weren't hinting at something
It's game time! I wish I had a fall evening with you tonight
Game time like class stuff? Me too me too me too. Can you call me soon? I want to hear your voice
I'm having a very hard time not being with you today
Can I call at ten?
My 11?
Yeah
Hope you're having a fulfilling day so far. Love you Martha
I love you, tim. Sorry for being so crabby last night.
Not at all Mattie. I'm sorry for being so out of it
Just working on hour four of group discussion
When will you be done?
I have no idea Mattie, I'm sorry
Aaaaaaaaaaaa I'm gonna be here so late!
I looove you
Are you okay?
Im fine, just wanted to hear your voice
Love you matts
Vanity plate: OGOD IOU
Also a classmate asked me if I was of Asian decent today
Hahahajaha x 2!! Going to happy hour hopefully home by 11
Ok :)
I wish you were looking pretty
You wish I was looking pretty??
I wish you were here. And you're pretty.
Are you already that drunk?
No.! Are you?
Nope
Home? I'm heading home soon
I am we're hosting
Oooo I want to see you host. Quite sexy
Call me when you're done mama
Don't break up with me, ok?

Sorry let me explain. I still obviously have so much love for you and want to share even what kind of pizza I order with you. I just know how good it is to be in your arms and in your bed. Thats a lot to not have. Losing all of you would be more than I could handle.
And I hope you agree.
That's very kind Mattie. I understand completely. I'm glad you keep me straight. I'll do better to keep myself straight. I DO AGREE!
It's not just you it's me, I know. I just need your help knowing you are with me and actively want to be with me sometimes and I'm not good at asking.
Well I do want to be with you!
Maybe we both need to use more romance?
Yes! What do you mean?
Surprises, notes, creativity. Its your turn to give an idea...
I love you and you're my best friend. Even if it's by default.... You really are.
Hahah you've got a great sense of humor Mattie, you're my bf too. I love you!
Your turn to say something significantly sweet
You're always outdoing me! Although you did say it was by default. That sounds like my kinda line
That's why I wrote it. Wanted you to know how it felt.... But seriously!
Ouch. I'm group working, what you doing?
Job searching...
Didn't work out today?
I haven't heard, jut hedging my bets
I wanth to go hkome
I want to be with you wherever. Don't give up yet
Are you okay
I'm worried about you. My phones gonna die soon so please tell me you're OK. Ill be home in an hour
Martha, this is not fair
I'm sorry I scared you last night. Call me when you wake up
Texan BBQ in Philly
Ooooh lucky! Having fun with Galvin? Wish I was there
You watching the tame campbell? And we're having fun :)
Not watching any game in fact I'm going to my soccer game soon. Say hey to the boy
I am nothing to you
I wish I didn't make you so crazy. I am trying
Not trying to make you crazy, trying to better understand us
Trying to prove aomething thats not true. I'm nothing
I'm Sarah 2.0
That's terrible and untrue. You are phenomenal and like nobody I've ever experienced
That's enfuriating and undermines the past few months
I'm broken
Forgettable
Nobody nothing I should wish to be like her in your eyes
Have you alteady told her we fought
Is she packing her bags to see you
I tried calling you to tell you how wrong that is. And to tell you that I love you. If nothing else just stop letting those ridiculous thoughts enter your head
Ugh im not ok this morning. I need you
I'm sorry Mattie! I hope you're ok. You are one of the strongest people I know. Embrace the change
I love you and I'm rooting for you
Thinking of you hottie
Hottie?
Yes I think you're tres hot
I know, it's just not a very vulnerable making compliment... Are you heading to the concert?
Well it's what I think! Heading soon
Are you ok? I just got a call from a mystery number in tx
Ok I wish you would text me that you're ok. I'm going to bed
I'm ok! Sorry Mattie don't know what that was. Love you
Surprise me sometime and be available when I'm worried and kind when I'm hurt
I'm sorry! I just feel like everything I do makes you worried or hurt. My frustration gets the best of me. I love you
Good luck today, sweetheart
Every couple nights I look at Facebook photos of you. I think you're terrifically beautiful. And terrifically smart
And I miss your warmth
Can we vchat tonight?
Sure, is everything ok?
Just tell me you're not breaking up with me
Of course! I just want to see your face
Don't worry so much Mattie!
I know I know I've just been not good lately
